summary: Rika is a ranger, she loves stealth around condors and goes for the kill. This save game is also for people wanting a challenge. What I mean by this is that she will stay a lvl one throughout the game. This is meant to be as a challenge save game, but you may lvl her up if you don\'t wish to take the challenge.
descriptionHtml:
Mods that will be need will be listed below. Links for the mods will be below alongside what they are. There is now a non challenge for people looking to do play normally. She will be lvl 18 and the perks are not spent in order to for you to customize how you want. Youtube video is Up please take a look to see if Rika is for you. If you have completed the challenge you may upload pics or videos show that you did :D

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7QyaTnz1u7o

ApachiiSkyHair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?\\

High Quality Eyes
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498/?

Lunari Race 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602/?

New Animation for Running with Bow
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16975/?

Straight hair retexture 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4333/?

Rangers Cape
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12864/?

TERA Armor Collection - CBBE - standalone
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29411/?


If you like this save don\'t forget to ENDORSEMENT it please so it can be seen by others. Thank you!
author: Slaidninj

files.name: Rika Lunari
files.changelogHtml:
Added a non challange for people just wanting to play normally. Be warned she is lvl 18 already so its a bit of a advantage to some.
perks have yet to be spent
